Articles.Content: So since the newest update and dlc I have started over and launched my first mun lander.  I was shocked that the landing gear is bouncing around like a pogo stick.  I have been doing landings for years, and now after the update I come in close to 2.5 m/s and when thye gear touches the ground, my ship shoots up into space about 6 meters and it makes it almost imposable to land.  Ive tried 2 different types of gear but it happens with all of them, I actually had 6 landing gears bounce and come down slightly sideways and started rolling around on the landing gear.  In the past the ship would just tip over.

Have you found a solution?  I have a similar problem.  I was using the Mission Builder and created this flyer for Laythe, which I placed as a landed craft on the Laythe polar region. It started bouncing like crazy.  Oddly, I did not have this problem at another location, but on the Laythe pole it went mad.
I have the same problems, all my lander designs are useless now in 1.4 and bounces around like crazy

11 hours ago, MrKernel said:

I have the same problems, all my lander designs are useless now in 1.4 and bounces around like crazy
